sentence.Network_en: The judge shook his head irritably and Juicks hushed.
sentence.Network_cn: 法官生气地摇摇头，朱克斯安静下来。

sentence.Network_en: He lost his temper and snapped irritably at the children.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发火了,暴躁地斥责孩子们.

sentence.Network_en: On this account the silence was irritably broken by a reproof.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了这件事,他妻子大声斥责,令人恼火地打破了宁静.

entry.def: If you are irritable, you are easily annoyed.

example.ex: He had been waiting for over an hour and was beginning to feel irritable.
example.tran: 他已经等了一个多小时,开始变得急躁了。

auth_sentence.content: You react irritably when friends advise you to let go and move on.
auth_sentence.res_content: You react irritably when friends advise you to let go and move on.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You react irritably when friends advise you to let go and move on.
